channel.title: The Chat for all of the Not-Pros
channel.description:
Ok! Ok! We're not all pros on Auxy. I'm not. That's why I created this topic.
This chat is for the noobs/not-pros/beginners/people-who-know-what-they're-doing-but-have-room-to-improve. I need help, others need help, and there's no better way to get help by helping each other.
If you would like other people to see your tracks that need improvement so they can work on them too, post the links to download them on the AUXY STUDIO APP. Then people can remix, tweak, add, or delete parts of your track and send you the link to their version of it.
That way, everyone can learn from each other.
Unite! And have a nice day üòÅ. -Andrew/Stickmanadventures

item.title: The Chat for all of the Not-Pros
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
@Stickmanadventures

ways that can help make your drop have a larger impact:

  • refrain from using full volume bass until the drop
  • have a sweeper come in the four bars before, then fade out in the drop
  • have a snappy snare with reverb
  • have a lot of reverb in general
  • change up the melody slightly
  • have a lot of elements in your drop, don‚Äôt just have a synth, a bass, and a drum loop

if you need more, just send a proj link over and I can maybe help

Read full topic
item.source: The Chat for all of the Not-Pros

item.title: The Chat for all of the Not-Pros
item.dc:creator: Stickmanadventures
item.description:

Read full topic
